{{cpp/utility/bitset/title|flip}}
{{cpp/utility/bitset/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcla|num=1|noexcept=c++11|constexpr=c++23|1=
bitset&amp; flip();
}}
{{dcla|num=2|constexpr=c++23|
bitset&amp; flip( std::size_t pos );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Flips bits, i.e. changes {{c|true}} values to {{c|false}} and {{c|false}} values to {{c|true}}.   Equivalent to a logical NOT operation on part or all of the bitset.

@1@ Flips all bits (like {{lc|operator~}}, but in-place).

@2@ Flips the bit at the position {{c|pos}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|pos|the position of the bit to flip}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}

===Exceptions===
@2@ Throws {{lc|std::out_of_range}} if {{c|pos}} does not correspond to a valid bit position.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;bitset&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::bitset&lt;4&gt; flops;
    
    std::cout &lt;&lt; flops &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; flops.flip(0) &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; flops.flip(2) &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; flops.flip() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
0000
0001
0101
1010
}}
